predicate.note: Frames file for 'restore' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry contribute-13.2, other framed members include refer, relinquish, sacrifice, surrender, transfer. Comparison with those for one roleset.

example.name: no benefactive
example.text: Stock prices surged as a multibillion-dollar takeover proposal helped *trace* restore market players' confidence about the prospects for further deal-making.
example.arg: market players' confidence about the prospects for further deal-making

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: Pacific Gas & Electric fell 3/8 to 19 5/8 in Big Board composite trading of 1.7 million shares and Pacific Telesis Group slipped 5/8 to 44 5/8 as the companies worked *trace* to restore service to areas affected by the quake.

example.name: art
example.text: John restored the priceless Gaugin painting to its original splendor.
